title: [Large-scale] Augmented Reality-Based Public Safety Training: SALTT Triage Technique Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic First-Aid Knowledge and Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Training Course for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers in Language Education to Improve Response Capabilities in Public Safety Situations. Provides Experiential Learning Environment Using Digital Devices (AR/VR Devices)

learning_goals: Learners can perform patient triage and response procedures using the SALTT triage technique with 85% accuracy in mass casualty scenarios.
Learners can improve decision-making and situational awareness in public safety crisis scenarios by 70% through AR simulations.
Learners can specifically explain how to apply public safety response knowledge in language education environments during post-training evaluations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
